tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ilamkele uyilo loMthetho-siHlomelo oYilwayo we-IPID wowama-2023 ukuba lungeniswe ePalamente.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi iwuvumile Umtsetfosivivinyo Loluhlaka Wekuchibela te-IPID wanga-2023 kutsi ungeniswe ePhalamende.
tgt_text: Lo Mthetho uYilwayo wenza izilungiso kuMthetho we-IPID wowama-2011 (uMthetho uNombl 1 wowama-2011), kwaye wenza neziphakamiso ezineenjongo zokuqinisekisa ukuba i-IPID izimele ngenene njengequmrhu kwakunye nendlela esebenza ngayo, into leyo izalisekisa imigqaliselo eyayimiselwe kwisigwebo setyala lika-McBride.

src_text: LoMtsetfosivivinyo uchibela Umtsetfo we-IPID, wanga-2011 (Umtsetfo Nombolo 1 wanga-2011), futsi wenta tiphakamiso lokuhloswe ngato kufaka kutimela kwekusebenta nekwesikhungo se-IPID, kunika emandla “kusehlulelo sa-McBride”.
tgt_text: Ezi zizilungiso ziza kusabela kanye kwimiba ephakanyiswe yiNkundla yoMgaqo-siseko eyathi amanye amasolotya oMthetho we-IPID wowama-2011 awekho mthethweni, agunyazisa uMphathiswa wezamaPolisa ukuba anqumamise uMlawuli wesiGqeba, ukuba athathele amanyathelo oluleko uMlawuli wesiGqeba emva kokuba enqunyanyisiwe, nokuba amgxothe uMlawuli wesiGqeba kwisikhundla sakhe.

src_text: Letichibelo tiphindze futsi tilungise tingcinamba letiphakanyiswe Inkantolo Yemtsetfosisekelo lememetele kutsi atikho emtsetfweni letinye timiso teMtsetfo wanga-2011 we-IPID, letagunyata Indvuna Yetemaphoyisa kutsi imise emsebentini Umcondzisi Wesigungu Lesiphetse, kutsatsa tinyatselo tekumcondzisa tigwegwe Umcondzisi Wesigungu Lesiphetse ngemuva kwekumiswa, kanye nekususwa ehhovisi Umcondzisi Wesigungu Lesiphetse.
tgt_text: Lo Mthetho uYilwayo uphakamisa ukuba iinkqubo yokuqeshwa koMlawuli wesiGqeba kufuneka iqhutywe elubala futhi ivuleleke nokuba kubekho neenkqubo ecacileyo yokuvavanya ukunyaniseka kwamagosa e-IPILo Mthetho uYilwayo ukwavulela nokuba kwenziwe ezinye izilungiso kuMthetho oyiNtloko, ukuze kuqinisekiswe ukuba i-IPID yenza umsebenzi wayo ewugunyazisiweyo kakuhle nangobuchule.

src_text: LoMtsetfosivivinyo uphakamisa kutsi kube nenchubo levulekile nalengafihli lutfo yekukhetfwa kweMcondzisi Wesigungu Lesiphetse kanye nenchubo lenemininingwane yekuhlola bucotfo betiphatsimandla te-IPILoMtsetfosivivinyo uphindze futsi uchubeke wente kutsi kube nekuchitjelwa kwaletinye timiso teMtsetfo Lomkhulu, ngenhloso yekucinisekisa kutsi i-IPID yenta ligunyakwenta layo ngemphumelelo futsi nangelikhono.
tgt_text: Uyilo lwalo Mthetho uYilwayo luyafumaneka apha: WEBTOKEUyilo loMthetho-siHlomelo oYilwayo weMithetho eBanzi yezoBuntlola (i-GILAB) wowama-2023 IKhabhinethi ivumile ukuba uyilo lwe-GILAB lowama-2023 lungeniswe ePalamente.

src_text: LoMtsetfosivivinyo wesikhashana uyatfolakala ku: WEBTOKEUmtsetfosivivinyo Loluhlaka Wekuchibela Imitsetfo Jikelele Yetebunhloli (i-GILAB) wanga-2023 Ikhabhinethi ikuvumile kungeniswa kwe-GILAB leluhlaka yanga-2023 kutsi ingeniswe ePhalamende.
tgt_text: I-GILAB iphakamisa ukuba kwenziwe izilungiso kuMthetho weSizwe wobuNgcali kwezobuNtlola, wowe-1994 (uMthetho uNombl 39 wowe-1994).

src_text: Le-GILAB iphakamisa tichibelo teMtsetfo Wavelonkhe Wetelisubuciko Letebunhloli, wanga-1994 (Umtsetfo Nombolo 39 wanga-199).
tgt_text: Lo Mthetho uYilwayo usabela kanye kwizindululo ezenziwa liGqiza likaMongameli leZinga eliPhezulu lokuPhonononga i-Arhente yoKhuseleko lweLizwe (i-SSA) kwakunye nesicwangciso sokufezekisa izindululo zeKhomishoni yoPhando eKhokelwa yiJaji ngeziTyholo zokuBanjwa ngoBhongwane koMbuso, uRhwaphilizo kunye nobuQhetseba kuRhulumente kuquka namaQumrhu oMbuso.

src_text: LoMtsetfosivivinyo unika emandla kutincomo tePhaneli yaMengameli letimayelana ne-Ejensi Yembuso Yetekuvikeleka (i-SSA) kanye nekufezekisa kwelisu letincomo teKhomishini Yetebulungiswa Lephenya Ngetinsolo Tekubanjwa Kwembuso Ngabhongwane, Inkhohlakalo neNkhohliso kuMkakha Wahulumende lokufaka ekhatsi Tinhlaka Tembuso.
tgt_text: Phakathi kwezinye izinto, lo Mthetho uYilwayo uzama:

src_text: Emkhatsini walokunye, loMtsetfosivivinyo uhlose:
tgt_text: ukwenza uhlenga-hlengiso kwiinkonzo zobuntlola ukuze zibe liziko elisebenza kakuhle nangobunono ngokuthi kusekwe i-arhente yezobuntlola yalapha ekhaya kunye necandelo lezobuntlola lezangaphandle

src_text: kwakha kabusha imisebenti yetebunhloli kwenta kutsi kube nesakhiwo sesikhungo lesitawusebenta ngemphumelelo nangelikhono ngekutsi sisungule i-ejensi yetebunhloli yasekhaya kanye neyemisebenti yetebunhloli yemave angephandle
tgt_text: ukulungisa ukuqhwalela okukhoyo kwindlela ebusebenza ngayo ubuXhaka-xhaka bokuQokelela uLwazi lwezoBuntlola njengoko yayitshilo iNkundla yoMgaqo-siseko

src_text: kulungisa emaphutsa ekusebenteni kweMandla Etimphawu teTebunhloli njengaloku kucinisekiswe Inkantolo yeMtsetfosisekelo
tgt_text: ukulungisa iindawo eziqhwalelayo ezabhaqwa ngenxa yemisebenzi yequmrhu lokulwa ukuthutyeleziswa kwemali, i-Financial Action Task Force, kuquka namanyathelo okulwa ukuthutyeleziswa kwemali kunye nokuxhasa ngezimali amaphulo obunqolobi ngokuthi kuxhotyiswe ngezakhono ii-arhente zezokhuselo lwamazwe ukuze zikwazi ukuba ziphande futhi zize zihlole ukuba umntu okanye iqumrhu elithile alizikulubeka mngciphekweni na ukhuseleko lwesizwe

src_text: kulungisa butsakatsaka lobubonwe yi-Financial Action Task Force, lokufaka ekhatsi tinyatselo tekulwa nekukhwabanisa imali nekusita ngetimali buphekulasikhuni ngekutsi kutfutfukiswe takhiwo tavelonkhe tekuvikeleka kutsi tikhone kuphenya nekwenta luhlolo lwetekuvikela nangabe umuntu nome sikhungo sifaka kuvikeleka kwavelonkhe
tgt_text: Ukuphucula imithetho elawula nephethe icandelo loonogada babucala njengenxalenye yenkqubo ebanzi yokuqinisekisa ukhuseleko lwesizwe kunye

src_text: kucinisa tinyatselo tekulawula nekuchumanisa imboni yetekuvikela letimele njengencenye lebanti yendlela yavelonkhe yekuvikela kanye
tgt_text: nokumisela imithetho eza kulawula aba babesakuba ngamalungu ecandelo lezobuntlola kunye nabanye abanolwazi ngeenkcukacha eziyimfihlo zobuntlola.

src_text: nekwenta kutsi kube netinyatselo tekulawula indlela yekutiphatsa kwemalunga aphambilini alesikhungo setebunhloli kanye nalabanye labafinyelela kutfola lwatiso lwetebunhloli.
tgt_text: Lo Mthetho uYilwayo uza kuphinda uqinisekise ukuba iinkonzo ze-SSA azisetyenziselwa iinjongo ezigwenxa ngabantu abathile.

src_text: LoMtsetfosivivinyo utawuchubeka futsi ucinisekise kutsi imisebenti ye-SSA ayisetjentiswa ngalokungafanele kufezekisa timfuno nome tinhlelo tebantfu labatsite.
tgt_text: Ezi zilungiso ziza kuphucula indlela ezibekwa ngayo phantsi kweliso ii-arhente zobuntlola ngamaqumrhu afana noMlawuli-Jikelele wezoBuntlola, iKomiti eHlangeneyo yezoBuntlola kunye noMphicothi-ziNcwadi-Jikelele woMzantsi Afrika.

src_text: Letichibelo titawucinisa kwenganyelwa kwemsebenti wema-ejensi etebunhloli lokutawukwentiwa yimitimba lefanana neMhloli Jikelele Wetebunhloli, Likomidi Lelihlanganisa Tindlu Totimbili Letebunhloli kanye neMhlolimabhuku Jikelele waseNingizimu Afrika.
tgt_text: Lo Mthetho uYilwayo uyafumaneka WEBTOKEN..UMthetho oYilwayo weKhomishoni yabaSebenzi bakaRhulumente (i-PSC) wowama-2023 IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukupapashwa koyilo loMthetho oYilwayo we-PSC wowama-2023 ukuze uluntu luhlomle kuwo.

src_text: Lomtsetfosivivinyo utfolakala ku: WEBTOKEN..Umtsetfosivivinyo Loluhlaka weKhomishini Yetemisebenti Yahulumende (i-PSC) wanga-2023 Ikhabhinethi ikuvumile kushicilelwa kweMtsetfosivivinyo loluhlaka we-PSC wanga-2023 kute kutsi ummango uphawule.
tgt_text: Lo Mthetho uYilwayo uguzula uMthetho we-PSC, wowe-1997 (uMthetho uNombl 46 wowe-1997) woMgaqo-siseko weRiphabhlikhi yoMzantsi Afrika wowe-1996.

src_text: LoMtsetfosivivinyo ucitsa Umtsetfo we-PSC, wanga-1997 (Umtsetfo Nombolo 46 wanga-1997) weMtsetfosisekelo waseRiphabhliki yaseNingizimu Afrika wanga-1996.
tgt_text: Lo Mthetho uYilwayo ucacise indlela eliza kusekwa ngayo iqumrhu lolawulo le-PSC eliza kuyenza izimele ngakumbi futhi ingathathi cala.

src_text: LoMtsetfosivivinyo wenta kutsi kube nekusungulwa kwamabhalane lotimele we-PSC kute kuciniswe kutimela nekungakhetsi kwalenhlangano.
tgt_text: Wakuba lo Mthetho uYilwayo utyikitywe wangumthetho ogcweleyo, amagunya e-PSC aza kwandiswa ayenze ifikele nakoomasipala kunye namaqumrhu ombuso.

src_text: Nangabe loMtsetfosivivinyo sewuphasisiwe waba ngumtsetfo, ligunyakwenta le-PSC litawufinyelela nakubomasipala nasetikhungweni temmango.
tgt_text: Esi silungiso siza kwenza i-PSC ibe nomsebenzi ocacileyo ize ikwazi ukuba negalelo elibonakalayo kumalinge okwakha urhulumente osabelayo, othembakelayo nokhokelisa imigaqo yokuziphatha esulungekileyo.

src_text: Lesichibelo sitawunika i-PSC indlelakwenta yekugcila kakhulu ekufakeni ligalelo lelivakalako ekwakheni temisebenti yahulumende tibe nguletiphendvulako, letenta tintfo ngenchubo lemukelekile futsi letichuntjwa ngemazingagugu.

src_text: LoMtsetfosivivinyo uchibela Umtsetfo Wemlawuli Wavelonkhe Wetenuzi (i-NNR), wanga-1999 (Umtsetfo Nombolo 47 wanga-1999).
tgt_text: Uyilo loMthetho-siHlomelo oYilwayo weQumrhu leSizwe eliLawula ezeNyukliya wowama-2023.

src_text: LoMtsetfosivivinyo uhlose kulungisa tikhebe letikhona kuloMtsetfo we-NNR wanga-1999 lokhona.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ivumile ukuba uMthetho oYilwayo weQumrhu eliLawula ezeNyukliya ungeniswe ePalamente.

src_text: LoMtsetfo kulesimo lokuso kwanyalo awuhambisani nekwenta lokuncono kakhulu kwemave emhlaba emkhakheni wemitsetfosimiso wetekuphepha kwetenuzi ngobe awulungisi kuvuleleka kunuzi nawusemsebentini kwemalunga lasebenta endizeni.
tgt_text: Lo Mthetho uYilwayo wenza izilungiso kuMthetho weSizwe weQumrhu leSizwe eliLawula ezeNyukliya (i-NNR), wowe-1999 (uMthetho uNombl 47 wowe-1999).

src_text: LoMtsetfosivivinyo uphindze wabhaleka ngendlela yekutsi uhambisane neMtsetfo we-NNR wanga-1999 nemitsetfosimiso ye-Ejensi Yemave Emhlaba Yetemandla Ete-Athomi (i-IAEA) kanye netindlela tekwenta letincono kakhulu.
tgt_text: Lo Mthetho uYilwayo ufuna ukuvala izikhewu ezikhoyo kulo Mthetho we-NNR ukhoyo wowe-1999.

src_text: Live laseNingizimu Afrika lililunga le-IAEA.
tgt_text: Ngokwale meko uyiyo ngoku lo Mthetho awuhambelani nendlela ekuqhutywa ngayo kwihlabathi kwicandelo lemithetho elawula ukhuseleko lwenyukliya kuba ayithethi nto ngabo bathe banqashwa yimitha yenyukliya basebenza emoyeni.

src_text: Imicimbi Letako.
tgt_text: Lo Mthetho uYilwayo wenzelwe ukuba uhambelane noMthetho we-NNR wowe-1999 uze ulandele imigaqo esetyenziswayo ye-Internation Atomic Energy Agency (i-IAEA).

src_text: Kubekwa esikhundleni kwaMengameli weRiphabhliki yaseNigeria
tgt_text: UMzantsi Afrika ulilungu le-IAEA.

src_text: NgeMsombuluko, mhla tinge-29 Inkhwekhweti 2023, Mengameli Ramaphosa utawuhlonipha simemo sekuhambela lomcimbi weKubekwa eSikhundleni kwaMengameli Losandza Kukhetfwa Mnu Bola Ahmed Tinubu waseRiphabhliki yaseNigeria.
tgt_text: Imisitho Ezayo.

src_text: Kutimbandzakanya kwaMengameli kutawukhombisa kuchubeka kwebudlelwane belisubuciko emkhatsini weNingizimu Afrika neleNigeria.
tgt_text: Ukubekwa ngokusesikweni kukaMongameli we-Federal Republic of Nigeria

src_text: Live leNigeria lingumlingani lomkhulu wekuhwebelana neNingizimu eNshonalanga Afrika.
tgt_text: NgoMvulo, umhla wama-29 kuCanzibe 2023, uMongameli Ramaphosa uza kuzimasa umsitho amenywe kuwo wokuBekwa ngokuSesikweni kwalowo uza kuba nguMongameli we-Federal Republic of Nigeria, uMnu Bola Ahmed Tinubu.

src_text: Tinhlobonhlobo letinyenti temafemu aseNingizimu Afrika atjale timali eNigeria, kantsi netinkampani taseNigeria nato tikhombisa kubakhona kwato lapha eNingizimu Afrika.
tgt_text: Ukuthatha inxaxheba kukaMongameli kulo msitho kubonakalisa ukuba isekhona intsebenziswano emandla phakathi koMzantsi Afrika ne-Nigeria.

src_text: Liviki Lekuvikela Bantfwana
tgt_text: I-Nigeria ilelona lizwe liliqabane lezorhwebo likhulu loMzantsi Afrika eNtshona Afrika.

src_text: INingizimu Afrika itawuhlonipha Liviki Lekuvikela Bantfwana kusukela mhla tinge-28 Inkhwekhweti kuya mhla ti-4 Inhlaba 2023 ngaphasi kwengcikitsi letsi: “Asivikeleni Bantfwana ngesikhatsi se-COVID-19 nangale Kwayo”.
tgt_text: Iinkampani ezahlukeneyo zoMzantsi Afrika zityale imali e-Nigeria, ngeli thuba likhulayo nenani leenkampani zase-Nigeria ezingena eMzantsi Afrika..IVeki yokuKhuselwa kwaBantwana UMzantsi Afrika uza kuphawula iVeki yokuKhuselwa kwaBantwana ukususela ngomhla wama-28 kuCanzibe ukuya kowesi-4 kweyeSilimela 2023 phantsi komxholo othi: “Masikhusele Abantwana ngeThuba le-COVID-19 naseMva Kwalo”.

src_text: Lomkhankhaso uhlanganisa yonkhe imikhakha nemimango kutsi kutfutfukiswe, kunakekelwe futsi kuvikelwe bantfwana.
tgt_text: Eli phulo likhuthaza onke amacandelo noluntu ngokubanzi ukuba bancedise ekukhuliseni baza bakhathalele futhi bakhusele abantwana.

src_text: Lonyaka lomkhankhaso utawugcila ku-RISIHA, lokuluhlelo lommango lwekuvikela nekungenelela kusenesikhatsi, lokuhloswe ngalo kususa bantfwana ekutseni babe ngulabahlaseleka lula babe ngulabacinile..Luvakasho lwekuhlola umsebenti we-DDM eMpumalanga Kapa.1 Lisekelamengameli, Mnu Paul Mashatile ngamhla tinge-26 kanye nangamhla tinge-27 Inkhwekhweti 2023 utawutsatsa Luvakasho lwekuhlola umsebenti we-DDM lwekuya e-OR Tambo District naseBuffalo City Metro, eMphumalanga Kapa.2 Loluvakasho luyincenye yemtamo yahulumende yekucinisekisa kutsi kunentfutfuko leyentekako emimangweni ngendlela lehlanganisiwe lesekelwa yindlela lechamuka ne-DDIphalamende yeSitfupha Yemave ase-Afrika (i-PAP)
tgt_text: Iphulo lalo nyaka liza kugxila kwi-RISIHA, inkqubo yoluntu yokuthintela neyokungenelela kusengethuba, eneenjongo zokuxhobisa abantwana abasesichengeni batsho bakwazi ukuzimela..UTyelelo lokuHlola kwi-DDM yaseNtshona Koloni.1 USekela-Mongameli, uMnu Paul Mashatile uza kubamba uTyelelo lokuya kuHlola lwe-DDM kwiSithili sase-OR Tambo kunye noMasipala oMbaxa wase-Buffalo City, eMpuma Koloni, ngomhla wama-26 nowama-27 kuCanzibe 2023.

src_text: Baholi labavela kulo lonkhe lelivekati bahlangene kusukela ngeMsombuluko, mhla ti-15 Inkhwekhweti 2023 eMidrand, eNingizimu Afrika kuPhalamende yeSitfupha ye-PALomhlangano utawuphela mhla ti-02 Inhlaba 2023.
tgt_text: Olu tyelelo luyinxalenye yephulo likarhulumente lokuqinisekisa ukuba uphuhliso loluntu lwenziwa ngendlela ehlangeneyo njengoko i-DDM nayo isitsho.

src_text: I-PAP ihlose kulungisa tinsayeya letikhona kulo lonkhe lelivekati futsi imelelwe baholi labavela kulo lonkhe lelivekati.
tgt_text: IPalamente yesiThandathu yePalamente yaMazwe e-Afrika (i-PAP)4.1 Iinkokeli eziphuma mbombo zone zeli lizwekazi zidibene ngoMvulo, umhla we-15 kuCanzibe 2023, e-Midrand, eMzantsi Afrika ziye kuthatha inxaxheba kwiPalamente yesiThandathu ye-PALe Palamente iza kuvala ngomhla wesi-2 kweyeSilimela 2023.

src_text: Ikhomishini Yesifundvolwandle Lehlanganisa Bohulumende (i-IOC)
tgt_text: Iinjongo ze-PAP kukulungisa iingxaki ezisihlupha sonke kweli lizwekazi kwaye imelwe zinkokeli zase-Afrika eziphuma mbombo zone zeli lizwekazi.

src_text: INingizimu Afrika itatimbandzakanya kuseshini ye-56 yesigungu semkhandlu letawubanjelwa eParis, eFrance kusukela mhla ti-16 kuya mhla tinge-30 Inhlaba 2023.
tgt_text: I-Intergovernmental Oceanographic Commission (i-IOC)5.1 UMzantsi Afrika uza kuthatha inxaxheba kwiseshoni yama-56 yebhunga lesigqeba eza kubanjelwa e-Paris, e-France, ukususela ngomhla we-16 ukuya kowama-30 kweyeSilimela 20 2 I-IOC yoMbutho wezeMfundo, ezeNzululwazi nezeNkcubeko weZizwe eziManyeneyo (i-IOC-UNESCO) liqumrhu le-UN elenza umsebenzi wokunika inkxaso kwiinkonzo nezenzululwazi yeelwandle zehlabathi.3 UMzantsi Afrika uyakuqonda ukubaluleka kophando nolawulo olufanelekileyo lweelwandle kunye namanxwema wawo ukwenzela uphuhliso oluzinzileyo.

src_text: I-IOC yeNhlangano yeTemfundvo, Yetesayensi Nemasiko kuMhlabuhlangene (i-IOC-UNESCO) ingumtimba waMhlabuhlangene lobukene nekwesekela imisebenti yesayensi yetelwandle emhlabeni wonkhe.
tgt_text: Uphando ngezaselwandle lukwanceda nokusilumkisa kwangethuba ngeentlekele ezenzeka elwandle luze luncede urhulumente akwazi ukuthatha izigqibo enolwazi olwaneleyo.

src_text: INingizimu Afrika iyakwatisa kubaluleka kwelucwaningo kanye nekulawula tilwandle tayo nemvelo leselugwini lwelwandle kute kutsi kube nentfutfuko lesimeme.
tgt_text: UMzantsi Afrika uza kusingatha imidlalo emikhulu.1 Abalandeli bezemidlalo abaphuma kulo lonke elimiweyo kufanele balindele ukwamkelwa ngobubele obubonisa Ubuntu kunye nokutendwa ngothando xa beze kuzimasa eMzantsi Afrika iNdebe yeHlabathi yeBhola yoMnyazi kunye ne-Kimura Shukokai International (i-KSI) Karate World Championship.

src_text: Lucwaningo ngelwandle luphindze futsi lusite ekukhipheni tecwayiso kusenesikhatsi letimayelana netinhlekelele telwandle nekusita hulumende kutsi atsatse tincumo asanelwatiso.
tgt_text: UMzantsi Afrika wazenzela igama ngokugqwesa kwindlela oyisingatha ngayo imisitho emikhulu.2 Uyaqhubeleka nokuvakala umoya wochulumanco njengoko sele kushiyeke isithuba esingaphezudlwana nje kwiintsuku ezingama-60 phambi kokuba iqalise iNdebe yeHlabathi yeBhola yoMnyazi eKapa ukususela ngomhla wama-28 kweyeKhala ukuya kowesi-6 kweyeThupha 2023.

src_text: Cholera outbreak Management
tgt_text: Cholera outbreak Management

src_text: Cabinet welcomed President Cyril Ramaphosa’s planned visit to and interaction with residents of Hammanskraal.
tgt_text: Cabinet welcomed President Cyril Ramaphosa’s planned visit to and interaction with residents of Hammanskraal.

src_text: The visit did take place today, Thursday, 08 June, 2023, and this engagement gave the President the opportunity to hear directly from residents about the challenges they face.
tgt_text: The visit did take place today, Thursday, 08 June, 2023, and this engagement gave the President the opportunity to hear directly from residents about the challenges they face.

src_text: The President, the Minister of Water and Sanitation and the Executive Mayor of Tshwane were able to assess government interventions in the area and provide relevant feedback to residents.
tgt_text: The President, the Minister of Water and Sanitation and the Executive Mayor of Tshwane were able to assess government interventions in the area and provide relevant feedback to residents.

src_text: Government interventions include the field hospital operational in Kanana, Hammanskraal, and a multi-disciplinary team of experts to arrest the spread which has successfully treated hundreds of people.
tgt_text: Government interventions include the field hospital operational in Kanana, Hammanskraal, and a multi-disciplinary team of experts to arrest the spread which has successfully treated hundreds of people.

src_text: Work is also underway to ensure that local councils use their water infrastructure grants effectively.
tgt_text: Work is also underway to ensure that local councils use their water infrastructure grants effectively.

src_text: For the current financial year, over R14 billion has been set aside for municipalities to address water infrastructure backlogs.
tgt_text: For the current financial year, over R14 billion has been set aside for municipalities to address water infrastructure backlogs.

src_text: Cabinet welcomes the cooperation between the City of Tshwane and Department of Water and Sanitation on the planned upgrade of the Rooiwal Water Treatment plant, which will be undertaken over three phases at a cost of R4 billion.
tgt_text: Cabinet welcomes the cooperation between the City of Tshwane and Department of Water and Sanitation on the planned upgrade of the Rooiwal Water Treatment plant, which will be undertaken over three phases at a cost of R4 billion.

src_text: Cabinet calls on the affected communities to remain vigilant and to take special care of children.
tgt_text: Cabinet calls on the affected communities to remain vigilant and to take special care of children.

src_text: Cholera can be prevented by using safe water.
tgt_text: Cholera can be prevented by using safe water.

src_text: Treat the water first by boiling it for at least 1 minute and always wash your hands with clean water and soap.
tgt_text: Treat the water first by boiling it for at least 1 minute and always wash your hands with clean water and soap.

src_text: For more information on prevention tips WEBTOKEN Government thanks those volunteer organisations and individuals who have stepped forward to lend a hand.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the reintroduction of the Blue, Green and No Drop Watch which were last conducted in 2013 and 2015 respectively.

src_text: The Green, Blue and No Drop Certification programmes are regulatory mechanisms of the Department of Water and Sanitation (DWS) as the water sector regulator in terms of both the National Water Act and Water Services Act, DWS
tgt_text: The Green, Blue and No Drop Certification programmes are regulatory mechanisms of the Department of Water and Sanitation (DWS) as the water sector regulator in terms of both the National Water Act and Water Services Act, DWS

src_text: The draft Bill aims to amend the National Small Enterprise Act (Act 102 of 1996) and provides for the establishment and registration of the Office of Small Enterprise Ombud Service.
tgt_text: The draft Bill aims to amend the National Small Enterprise Act (Act 102 of 1996) and provides for the establishment and registration of the Office of Small Enterprise Ombud Service.

src_text: It broadens fair processes for small enterprises through the Ombud Service, which will be tasked with considering and disposing of complaints by small enterprises.

src_text: Implementation of the amendments will realise greater stability to the sector and advance economic opportunity through the creation of job opportunities by small, medium and micro enterprises.
